definitions: こっそり (adv, adv-to) stealthily, secretly
english: Hey, CLOUD! Why don't the two of us sneak out of here and spend some time together?
japanese: ね、CLOUD！ふたりでこっそり遊びにいかない？

definitions: 正式[せいしき] (adj-na, adj-no, n) due form, official, formality
english: Well, not a real one…
japanese: 正式には、ない

definitions: 青年[せいねん] (n) youth, young man
english: No, just a mixed-up kid…
japanese: う～ん、不幸な青年、ね

definitions: 散歩[さんぽ] (n, vs) walk, stroll
english: Uh, I was jus' thinkin' of goin' for a walk…
japanese: いや、散歩でもしねえかと思ってよ

definitions: 付き合う[つきあう] (v5u, vi) to associate with, to keep company with, to go out with, to go steady with, to get on with,to go along with, to follow someone's lead, to accompany someone, to compromise
english: Would you…keep me company for a bit.
japanese: ちょ、ちょっとアタシに付き合ってくれよ

definitions: 客室[きゃくしつ] (n) guest room (at a hotel), guest cabin (on a boat), passenger cabin (on a plane),drawing room
english: Hotel
japanese: 客室

definitions: ターミナル (n) terminal
english: Terminal Floor
japanese: ターミナルフロア

definitions: 主人公[しゅじんこう] (n) protagonist, main character, hero(ine) (of a story),head of household
english: You two will play the leads in tonight's show!!
japanese: あなた方がこれから始まるショーの主人公です！！！！

definitions: ナレーション (n) narration
english: Narration
japanese: ナレーション

definitions: 物語[ものがたり] (n, vs, adj-no) tale, story, legend
english: Long, long ago…
japanese: むか～し、昔のそのまた昔の物語

definitions: 王国[おうこく] (n) kingdom, monarchy
english: An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia…
japanese: 和平なガルディア王国にとつじょとして襲いかかる、邪悪な影…

definitions: 突如[とつじょ] (adv) suddenly, all of a sudden
english: An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia…
japanese: 和平なガルディア王国にとつじょとして襲いかかる、邪悪な影…

definitions: 襲いかかる[おそいかかる] (v5r, vi) to rush on, to attack, to swoop down on
english: An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia…
japanese: 和平なガルディア王国にとつじょとして襲いかかる、邪悪な影…

definitions: 邪悪[じゃあく] (adj-na, n) wicked, evil
english: An evil shadow appeared over the peaceful kingdom of Galdia…
japanese: 和平なガルディア王国にとつじょとして襲いかかる、邪悪な影…

definitions: 竜王[りゅうおう] (n) Dragon King,promoted rook
english: Princess Rosa was kidnapped by the Evil Dragon King, Valvados. What will become of her?
japanese: ああ、悪竜王ヴァルヴァドスにさらわれた姫君ルーザの運命はどうなってしまうのでありましょうか…

definitions: 姫君[ひめぎみ] (n) daughter of a person of high rank (i.e. a king, noble, aristocrat, etc.)
english: Princess Rosa was kidnapped by the Evil Dragon King, Valvados. What will become of her?
japanese: ああ、悪竜王ヴァルヴァドスにさらわれた姫君ルーザの運命はどうなってしまうのでありましょうか…

definitions: 勇者[ゆうしゃ] (n) hero, the brave, man of valour (valor)
english: Just then, the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!
japanese: しかし、その時！伝説の勇者アルフリードがガルディア王国にあらわれたのであります！！

definitions: 有る[ある] (v5r-i, vi) to be, to exist, to live,to have,to be located,to be equipped with,to happen, to come about
或[ある] (adj-pn) a certain ..., some ...
二[アル] (num) two
アル (cop-da) be, is
english: Oh……You must be the legendary hero…Alfred!
japanese: おお～、あな～たこそ～伝説の勇者～、アルフリ～ド！

definitions: 振り[ふり] (n) swing, shake, wave, swinging,appearance, behaviour,pretence (pretense), show, pretending (to),going to restaurant, hotel etc. without a reservation or introduction,move (dance), postures,lead in (e.g. to a running joke, asking a question), lead up,unsewn part of a hanging sleeve on a traditional Japanese woman's garment,counter for swords, blades, etc.,not wearing underwear or pants
不利[ふり] (n, adj-na) disadvantage, handicap, unfavorable position
不理[ふり] (adj-na, n) unreasonable, irrational, illogical
不離[ふり] (n) inseparability
降り[ふり] (n) rainfall, snowfall,alighting, descending
浮利[ふり] (n) easy money, quick profit
english: Oh……You must be the legendary hero…Alfred!
japanese: おお～、あな～たこそ～伝説の勇者～、アルフリ～ド！

definitions: 姫[ひめ] (n) young lady of noble birth, princess (esp. in Western contexts, tales, etc.),girl,small, cute, lesser (in names of species),prostitute
english: By my soul, please…please save Princess Rosa!
japanese: なぜかわかりま～す、わかるので～す。どうか～、どうか、ルーザ姫をお救い、くださ～～～い

definitions: 救い[すくい] (n, adj-no) help, aid, relief, (religious) salvation, (Christian) grace, providence
english: By my soul, please…please save Princess Rosa!
japanese: なぜかわかりま～す、わかるので～す。どうか～、どうか、ルーザ姫をお救い、くださ～～～い

definitions: 住処[すみか] (n) dwelling, house, residence, den, habitat

japanese: 悪竜王ヴァルヴァドスのすみかは～はるか険しい山の上～。あわれル～ザは捕われの身～

definitions: 遥か[はるか] (adj-na, adv, n) far, far away, distant, remote, far off
english: On the peak of a dangerous mountain… dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados… who's kidnapped Princess Rosa…
japanese: 悪竜王ヴァルヴァドスのすみかは～はるか険しい山の上～。あわれル～ザは捕われの身～

definitions: 捕らわれる[とらわれる] (v1, vi) to be caught, to be captured, to be taken prisoner, to be arrested, to be apprehended,to be seized with (fear, etc.), to be a slave to, to stick to, to adhere to, to be swayed by
english: On the peak of a dangerous mountain… dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados… who's kidnapped Princess Rosa…
japanese: 悪竜王ヴァルヴァドスのすみかは～はるか険しい山の上～。あわれル～ザは捕われの身～

definitions: 語りかける[かたりかける] (v1) to make a speech, to address
english: But… you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now! Talk to one who can help you…
japanese: しか～し今のお前では悪竜王には勝て～ん！お前の力とな～る者に語りかけよ～

definitions: 魔法使い[まほうつかい] (n) magician, wizard, sorcerer, witch
english: The wizard
japanese: 魔法使い

definitions: 万[まん] (n, adj-no) 10,000, ten thousand,myriad,everything, all,various
マン (n, n-suf) man
満[まん] (n) full (years, etc.),whole, all,fully enough, not lacking,Manchuria
萬[ワン] (ctr) counter for character tiles
english: I am the great wizard, Vorman. What do you wish to know?
japanese: わた～しは大魔法使いボーマン～。お前～は何を知りたいの～？

definitions: 弱点[じゃくてん] (n) weak point, weakness, shortcoming, defect, flaw, sore spot, tender spot
english: The Evil Dragon King's weakness
japanese: 悪竜王～の～弱点

definitions: 修理[しゅうり] (n, vs) repair, mending, fixing, servicing
掏摸[すり] (n) pickpocket
刷り[すり] (n) printing

japanese: ル～ザ姫の～スリ～サイズ

definitions: サイズ (n) size
english: The Princess' measurements
japanese: ル～ザ姫の～スリ～サイズ

definitions: 打ち勝つ[うちかつ] (v5t, vi) to conquer (e.g. an enemy), to defeat,to overcome (a difficulty),to out-hit
english: The power of love… Is the only weapon that can withstand the fangs of the Evil Dragon King…!
japanese: 愛しあ～う２人の力こそが～悪竜王の邪悪な～る牙に打ち勝つただひとつの武器～！

definitions: 我が[わが] (adj-pn) my, our, one's own
我[われ] (pref) I, me,oneself,you,prefix indicating familiarity or contempt
我[が] (n) obstinacy,atman, the self, the ego
english: I am the Evil Dragon King…Valvados! I have not harmed the Princess… I have been expecting…you!
japanese: 我こそは～、悪竜王ヴァルヴァドス～！さらった姫に～何もしないで待っていたぞ～！

definitions: 口付け[くちづけ] (n, vs) kiss
english: A kiss! The power of True Love!!
japanese: 口づけを～！真実の愛の～力を～！！

definitions: 竜[りゅう] (n) dragon (esp. a Chinese dragon),naga, [object Object],promoted rook
english: Kiss the Evil Dragon King
japanese: 悪竜～王にする～

definitions: 王[おう] (n, n-suf) king, ruler, sovereign, monarch,tycoon, magnate, champion, master,king (of the senior player)
大君[おおきみ] (n) emperor, king, prince
english: Kiss the Evil Dragon King
japanese: 悪竜～王にする～

definitions: 逃げ[にげ] (n) escape, getaway, evasion
english: To home
japanese: スタコ～ラ逃げ～る

definitions: 目出度い[めでたい] (adj-i) happy, auspicious, propitious, joyous,naive
english: Oh, how profound the power of love… And so the legendary hero Alfred and our story live on happily ever after.
japanese: ああ、何と強い愛の力でありましょう……伝説の勇者アルフリードの物語はこうしてめでたく棊を閉じるのであります

definitions: イヤ (n) ear,year
いや (int) why, oh,no!, quit it!, stop!
english: You must be kidding!
japanese: こんなのイヤー！

definitions: 押し[おし] (n) push, pressure, authority, audacity
唖[おし] (n) muteness, speech impairment,mute, deaf-mute
鴛鴦[おしどり] (n) mandarin duck
圧し[おし] (n) weight, pressing down, commanding presence, authority
御師[おし] (n) low-ranking priest
推し[おし] (n-suf) fan of ..., supporter of ..., pushing for...
english: The play's a disaster! Now I'm getting mad!
japanese: おしばい、だいなしじゃない！もう怒ったんだから！

definitions: 倍[ばい] (suf) twice, double,times, -fold
バイ (n) by,bye,bisexual
貝[ばい] (n) Japanese babylon (species of shelled mollusk, Babylonia japonica), Japanese ivory shell,spinning top (traditionally made from a Japanese babylon shell)
ばい (prt) [object Object]
霾[ばい] (n) loess, yellow sand, bai, dust from the Yellow River region (China)
english: The play's a disaster! Now I'm getting mad!
japanese: おしばい、だいなしじゃない！もう怒ったんだから！

definitions: 美女[びじょ] (n) beautiful woman
美女[びんじょ] (n) beautiful woman,lady attendant
english: Beautiful Girl
japanese: 美女性

definitions: 性[せい] (suf) nature (of a person),sex,gender,-ty, -ity, -ness, -cy
性[さが] (n) one's nature, one's destiny,custom, tradition, habit, convention
性[しょう] (n, n-suf) nature (of a person or thing),that which does not change according to external influences
性[なりくせ] (n) disposition, nature, character
english: Beautiful Girl
japanese: 美女性

definitions: 鈍い[にぶい] (adj-i) dull (e.g. a knife), blunt,thickheaded, obtuse, stupid,dull (sound, color, etc.), dim (light),slow, sluggish, inert, lethargic,indulgent (esp. to the opposite sex), doting
呪い[のろい] (n) curse, spell, malediction
english: Thank…you. You've released me…from the spell and I am my normal self again…
japanese: ありがとう～ございます～。おかげで～のろいがとけて～元の姿にもどれま～した～

definitions: 解ける[とける] (v1, vi) to be solved,to loosen, to come untied,to be removed (e.g. restrictions), to be cleared (e.g. misunderstandings), to be broken (e.g. spells, curses),to melt
溶ける[とける] (v1, vi) to melt, to thaw, to fuse, to dissolve
english: Thank…you. You've released me…from the spell and I am my normal self again…
japanese: ありがとう～ございます～。おかげで～のろいがとけて～元の姿にもどれま～した～

definitions: ゴンドラ (n) gondola (boat),gondola (of a hot-air balloon, airship, etc.), basket, cabin (of a cable car, ski lift, etc.), car (of an elevator)
english: Oh, that was fun. Hey, let's go on the Gondola.
japanese: あ～、おもしろかった。ね、次はゴンドラ乗ろう

definitions: 観[かん] (n-suf) look, appearance,spectacle, sight,observation meditation,outlook on ..., view of ...
english: Inside the Ferris Wheel
japanese: 観らん車内部

definitions: 別人[べつじん] (n) different person, someone else, changed man
english: Two completely different people, but look exactly the same.
japanese: 全然別人なんだけど、そっくり

definitions: 歩き[あるき] (n) walk, walking,foot messenger (of a town, village, etc.)
english: The way you walk, gesture…
japanese: 歩きかた、手の動かしかた……

definitions: 誘う[さそう] (v5u, vt) to invite, to ask (someone to do), to call (for), to take (someone) along,to tempt, to lure, to entice, to seduce,to induce (tears, laughter, sleepiness, etc.), to arouse (e.g. sympathy), to provoke
english: You should've asked one of them!
japanese: それならよ、どっちか誘えば良かっただろうが！

definitions: 宝物[たからもの] (n) treasure, treasured item, prized possession
english: She's my baby. My prized possession.
japanese: マリンは、オレの宝物だからな

definitions: 次に[つぎに] (conj) next, then, after that
english: Next time we come, let's take our time and go on more rides.
japanese: 次に来たときはもっとゆっくりといろ～んなものに乗ろうね

definitions: こそこそ (adv, adv-to, vs) sneakily, secretly, stealthily
english: …it's CAIT SITH. What's he doin' so quietly?
japanese: ……CAIT SITHだぜ。なにコソコソしてやがるんだ？

definitions: 隠れ[かくれ] (n) hidden, concealed, unknown, crypto-,passing away, dying, death
english: W, w, wait a second. I won't run or hide.
japanese: ちょちょ、ちょっと待って～や。逃げも隠れもしませんから

definitions: 図々しい[ずうずうしい] (adj-i) impudent, shameless
english: You're pushin' it‚CAIT SITH! You gotta lot of nerve staying with us all the while being a spy!
japanese: ずうずうしいぞ、CAIT SITH！スパイだとわかってていっしょにいられるわけないだろ！

definitions: 医する[いする] (vs-s, vt) to cure, to heal
english: Then‚what are you goin' to do? Destroy me?
japanese: ほな、どないするんですか？ボクを壊すんですか？

definitions: 玩具[おもちゃ] (n) toy, plaything
english: You'd just be wastin' your time if you tried. This body's just a toy anyway.
japanese: そんなんしても、ムダですよ。この身体、もともとオモチャやから

definitions: 本体[ほんたい] (n) substance, real form,main part, main unit, body (of a machine),this machine, this appliance,object of worship (at a shrine, temple, etc.),noumenon,base price, pre-tax price
english: My real body's at Shinra Headquarters in Midgar. I'm controlin' this toy cat from there.
japanese: 本体はミッドガルの神羅本社におるんですわ。そっから、このネコのおもちゃ操っとるわけなんです

definitions: 玩具[おもちゃ] (n) toy, plaything

japanese: 本体はミッドガルの神羅本社におるんですわ。そっから、このネコのおもちゃ操っとるわけなんです

definitions: 明かす[あかす] (v5s, vt) to pass (the night), to spend,to reveal, to divulge, to disclose, to expose,to prove, to verify
飽かす[あかす] (v5s, vt) to bore, to tire, to weary, to stultify,to use lavishly (and without regret)
証す[あかす] (v5s) to prove, to verify
english: He won't come clean. And he won't quit being a spy.
japanese: 正体はあかさない。スパイはやめない

definitions: 話し合い[はなしあい] (n, vs) discussion, conference
english: …I thought so. It won't do any good talking to you.
japanese: ……まぁそうやろなぁ。話し合いにもならんわな

definitions: 人質[ひとじち] (n) hostage
english: I didn't want to do this either. Not by using dirty tricks and taking hostages…
japanese: そりゃ、ボクかってこんなことやりたない。人質とかヒレツなやりかたは……

definitions: 片刃[かたば] (n, adj-no) single edge (e.g. sword blade)
english: I didn't want to do this either. Not by using dirty tricks and taking hostages…
japanese: そりゃ、ボクかってこんなことやりたない。人質とかヒレツなやりかたは……
